recommendations.title: Implement Complete Security Headers
recommendations.description: Ensure all critical security headers are properly configured
recommendations.impact: Prevents XSS, clickjacking, and other security vulnerabilities

recommendations.title: Optimize Core Web Vitals
recommendations.description: Focus on page loading performance and user experience metrics
recommendations.impact: Improves search engine rankings and user satisfaction

recommendations.title: Enhance Structured Data
recommendations.description: Add comprehensive schema markup for better search visibility
recommendations.impact: Enables rich snippets and improved search appearance

recommendations.title: Review Content Security Policy
recommendations.description: Regularly audit and tighten CSP directives
recommendations.impact: Reduces XSS attack surface while maintaining functionality

issues: H3 elements without H2 parent headings
recommendations: Consider including relevant keywords like "Bitcoin" in title
Consider adding H2 headings to structure content
Ensure proper heading hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3)
Consider adding robots meta tag for search engine control
Add canonical link to prevent duplicate content issues
Add Open Graph tags for better social media sharing
Add structured data (JSON-LD or microdata) for better search results
Add internal links to improve site navigation and SEO
